description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from China vs Thailand in the Friendlies Women
title: China vs Thailand: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head
title_page: China vs Thailand: Friendlies Women stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 3 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt missed. Tang Jiali (China PR) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Sun Fangxin.
Goal!
Goal! China PR 5, Thailand 1. Wang Aifang (China PR) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Post
Attempt saved. Wang Siqian (China PR) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
